scripts.dev-prepare: yarn workspace @icod2/contracts build && yarn workspace @icod2/protocols build
scripts.dev-copy-env-file: echo "#GENERATED FROM .env files in root project" > fe/.env.local && cat .env >> fe/.env.local && touch .env.local && cat .env.local >> fe/.env.local
scripts.dev: yarn dev-copy-env-file && concurrently "yarn workspace @icod2/fe dev" "dotenvx run -f .env.local -f .env  -- yarn workspace @icod2/be start"
